data.name: Ravenous Devils
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1615290/Ravenous_Devils/


About the Game



Manage a tailor shop and corpse-cooking business in a city where crime, corruption and poverty are commonplace. Percival and Hildred have just moved here with nothing but a dream: to get extremely rich.

Take control of Percival to manage the tailor shop, wait for the arrival of clients looking for new suits and dresses, kill them when the moment is right, and throw them down the trap door, leading to the kitchen. Not before stealing their outfits however, their materials ready to be made into brand new clothes: waste not, want not!



Take care of Hildred's pub and customers. Feed them delightful corpse-based meals, manage resources effectively and make sure not to run out of ingredients.



Increase the reputation of their businesses by buying new tools, learning new recipes and upgrading the shops, but beware... someone knows their secret.



Features:
- Sharpen your fast paced Point and Click skills
- Experience truly Gory gameplay
- Upgrade your equipment, cook up new recipes and develop your shops
- Meet grotesque characters
- 4 hours of playtime to complete the story

Manage a tailor shop and corpse-cooking business in a city where crime, corruption and poverty are commonplace. Percival and Hildred have just moved here with nothing but a dream: to get extremely rich.

Take control of Percival to manage the tailor shop, wait for the arrival of clients looking for new suits and dresses, kill them when the moment is right, and throw them down the trap door, leading to the kitchen. Take care of Hildred's pub and customers. Feed them delightful corpse-based meals, manage resources effectively and make sure not to run out of ingredients.



Increase the reputation of their businesses by buying new tools, learning new recipes and upgrading the shops, but beware... someone knows their secret.

data.short_description: A horror cooking simulator where the secret ingredient is crime. Improve your shops, buy new tools, expand your menu, and above all, make your customers happy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Japanese, Turkish, German, Thai
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or higher
  • Processor: I3-4130 3,40 GhZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac is unsupported at the moment
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700HQ CPU@2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

movies.name: Ravenous Devils Trailer - Horror Cooking Simulator

content_descriptors.notes:
The following story is purely fictional and the plot is not to be associated with actual historical records.
The game contains explicit violence and gore. The content of the game may be harmful or traumatising to some audiences.
Viewer discretion is advised.
